comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content:
The photo says "Main Avenue". It  is an important photo as it is before the central avenue was deeply excavated, widened and replanted with figs after the construction of the City Circle Railway line in the early 1920's. the slight slope of the land down towards the right indicates it is taken looking south. The photo below is taken looking north.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/63385174@N06/6305343769/in/photostream]
